channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What to watch for during Casey Means' confirmation hearing for surgeon general

item.title: French Police Arrest 5 More in Louvre Jewel Heist Investigation
item.description: The authorities have detained seven suspects in total, but have not recovered the stolen jewels.

item.title: Trump keeps flirting with the idea of a third term. That would be unconstitutional
item.description: A recent interview with Steve Bannon reignited chatter about whether President Trump would try to run in 2028, despite the 22nd Amendment.

item.title: Trump and Xi, Hoping to Ease Trade War, Agree to 1-Year Truce
item.description: China agreed to suspend for a year some of its limits on exports of rare earth metals, while the U.S. halved its fentanyl-related tariffs.
